446  Textures.Input.Slider.H.Hover.Init( &m_Texture, 416, 32 + 16, 15, 15 );
447  Textures.Input.Slider.H.Down.Init( &m_Texture, 416, 32 + 32, 15, 15 );
448  Textures.Input.Slider.H.Disabled.Init( &m_Texture, 416, 32 + 48, 15, 15 );
449  Textures.Input.Slider.V.Normal.Init( &m_Texture, 416 + 16, 32, 15, 15 );
450  Textures.Input.Slider.V.Hover.Init( &m_Texture, 416 + 16, 32 + 16, 15, 15 );
451  Textures.Input.Slider.V.Down.Init( &m_Texture, 416 + 16, 32 + 32, 15, 15 );
452  Textures.Input.Slider.V.Disabled.Init( &m_Texture, 416 + 16, 32 + 48, 15, 15 );
453  Textures.CategoryList.Outer.Init( &m_Texture, 256, 384, 63, 63, Margin( 8, 8, 8, 8 ) );
454  Textures.CategoryList.Inner.Init( &m_Texture, 256 + 64, 384, 63, 63, Margin( 8, 21, 8, 8 ) );

553  rect.x += textStart + textWidth - 4;
554  rect.w -= textStart + textWidth - 4;

556  }

658 
659  virtual void DrawProgressBar( Gwen::Controls::Base* control, bool isHorizontal, float progress )
660  {
661  Gwen::Rect rect = control->GetRenderBounds();
662  Gwen::Color FillColour( 0, 211, 40, 255 );
663 
664  if ( isHorizontal )
665  {
666  Textures.ProgressBar.Back.Draw( GetRender(), rect );
667  rect.w *= progress;
668 
669  if ( rect.w > 0 )
670  { Textures.ProgressBar.Front.Draw( GetRender(), rect ); }
671  }
672  else
673  {
674  Textures.ProgressBar.Back.Draw( GetRender(), rect );
675  int inv_progress = rect.h * ( 1 - progress );
676  rect.y += inv_progress;
677  rect.h -= inv_progress;
678  Textures.ProgressBar.Front.Draw( GetRender(), rect );
679  }
680  }

695  }
696 
697  if ( control->IsHovered() )
698  { return Textures.Input.ListBox.Hovered.Draw( GetRender(), control->GetRenderBounds() ); }
699 
700  if ( bEven )
701  { return Textures.Input.ListBox.EvenLine.Draw( GetRender(), control->GetRenderBounds() ); }
702 
703  return Textures.Input.ListBox.OddLine.Draw( GetRender(), control->GetRenderBounds() );
704  }
705 
706  void DrawSliderNotchesH( Gwen::Rect rect, int numNotches, int dist )
707  {
708  if ( numNotches == 0 ) { return; }
709 
710  float iSpacing = ( float ) rect.w / ( float ) numNotches;
711 
712  for ( int i = 0; i < numNotches + 1; i++ )
713  {
714  GetRender()->DrawFilledRect( Gwen::Rect( rect.x + iSpacing * i, rect.y + dist - 2, 1, 5 ) );
715  }
716  }
717 
718  void DrawSliderNotchesV( Gwen::Rect rect, int numNotches, int dist )
719  {
720  if ( numNotches == 0 ) { return; }
721 
722  float iSpacing = ( float ) rect.h / ( float ) numNotches;
723 
724  for ( int i = 0; i < numNotches + 1; i++ )
725  {
726  GetRender()->DrawFilledRect( Gwen::Rect( rect.x + dist - 1, rect.y + iSpacing * i, 5, 1 ) );
727  }
728  }
729 
730  virtual void DrawSlider( Gwen::Controls::Base* control, bool bIsHorizontal, int numNotches, int barSize )
731  {
732  if ( bIsHorizontal )
733  {
734  Gwen::Rect rect = control->GetRenderBounds();
735  rect.x += barSize/2;
736  rect.w -= barSize;
737  rect.y += rect.h/2 - 1;
738  rect.h = 1;
739  GetRender()->SetDrawColor( Gwen::Color( 0, 0, 0, 100 ) );
740  DrawSliderNotchesH( rect, numNotches, barSize/2 );
741  return GetRender()->DrawFilledRect( rect );
742  }
743 
744  Gwen::Rect rect = control->GetRenderBounds();
745  rect.y += barSize/2;
746  rect.h -= barSize;
747  rect.x += rect.w/2 - 1;
748  rect.w = 1;
749  GetRender()->SetDrawColor( Gwen::Color( 0, 0, 0, 100 ) );
750  DrawSliderNotchesV( rect, numNotches, barSize * 0.4 );
751  return GetRender()->DrawFilledRect( rect );
752  }
753 
754  virtual void DrawComboBox( Gwen::Controls::Base* control, bool bDown, bool bMenuOpen )
755  {
756  if (control->IsDisabled())
757  return Textures.Input.ComboBox.Disabled.Draw( GetRender(), control->GetRenderBounds() );
758 
759  if (bDown || bMenuOpen)
760  return Textures.Input.ComboBox.Down.Draw( GetRender(), control->GetRenderBounds() );
761 
762  if (control->IsHovered())
763  return Textures.Input.ComboBox.Hover.Draw( GetRender(), control->GetRenderBounds() );
764 
765  Textures.Input.ComboBox.Normal.Draw( GetRender(), control->GetRenderBounds() );
766  }
767 
768  virtual void DrawKeyboardHighlight( Gwen::Controls::Base* control, const Gwen::Rect & r, int iOffset )
769  {
770  Gwen::Rect rect = r;
771  rect.x += iOffset;
772  rect.y += iOffset;
773  rect.w -= iOffset * 2;
774  rect.h -= iOffset * 2;
775  //draw the top and bottom
776  bool skip = true;
777 
778  for ( int i = 0; i < rect.w/2; i++ )
779  {
780  m_Render->SetDrawColor( Gwen::Color( 0, 0, 0, 255 ) );
781 
782  if ( !skip )
783  {
784  GetRender()->DrawPixel( rect.x + ( i * 2 ), rect.y );
785  GetRender()->DrawPixel( rect.x + ( i * 2 ), rect.y + rect.h - 1 );
786  }
787  else
788  { skip = !skip; }
789  }
790 
791  skip = false;
792 
793  for ( int i = 0; i < rect.h/2; i++ )
794  {
795  GetRender()->SetDrawColor( Gwen::Color( 0, 0, 0, 255 ) );
796 
797  if ( !skip )
798  {
799  GetRender()->DrawPixel( rect.x , rect.y + i * 2 );
800  GetRender()->DrawPixel( rect.x + rect.w - 1, rect.y + i * 2 );
801  }
802  else
803  { skip = !skip; }
804  }
805  }

812  virtual void DrawScrollButton( Gwen::Controls::Base* control, int iDirection, bool bDepressed, bool bHovered, bool bDisabled )
813  {
814  int i = 0;
815 
816  if ( iDirection == Pos::Top ) { i = 1; }
817 
818  if ( iDirection == Pos::Right ) { i = 2; }
819 
820  if ( iDirection == Pos::Bottom ) { i = 3; }
821 
822  if ( bDisabled )
823  { return Textures.Scroller.Button.Disabled[i].Draw( GetRender(), control->GetRenderBounds() ); }
824 
825  if ( bDepressed )
826  { return Textures.Scroller.Button.Down[i].Draw( GetRender(), control->GetRenderBounds() ); }
827 
828  if ( bHovered )
829  { return Textures.Scroller.Button.Hover[i].Draw( GetRender(), control->GetRenderBounds() ); }
830 
831  return Textures.Scroller.Button.Normal[i].Draw( GetRender(), control->GetRenderBounds() );
832  }

885  void DrawColorDisplay( Controls::Base* control, Gwen::Color color )
886  {
887  Gwen::Rect rect = control->GetRenderBounds();
888 
889  if ( color.a != 255 )
890  {
891  GetRender()->SetDrawColor( Gwen::Color( 255, 255, 255, 255 ) );
892  GetRender()->DrawFilledRect( rect );
893  GetRender()->SetDrawColor( Gwen::Color( 128, 128, 128, 128 ) );
894  GetRender()->DrawFilledRect( Gwen::Rect( 0, 0, rect.w/2, rect.h/2 ) );
895  GetRender()->DrawFilledRect( Gwen::Rect( rect.w/2, rect.h/2, rect.w/2, rect.h/2 ) );
896  }
897 
898  GetRender()->SetDrawColor( color );
899  GetRender()->DrawFilledRect( rect );
900  GetRender()->SetDrawColor( Gwen::Color( 0, 0, 0, 255 ) );
901  GetRender()->DrawLinedRect( rect );
902  }

1012

1016  { return Textures.CategoryList.Header.Draw( GetRender(), ctrl->GetRenderBounds() ); }
1017 
1018  Textures.CategoryList.Inner.Draw( GetRender(), ctrl->GetRenderBounds() );
1019  }
1020  };
1021  }
1022 }
